forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 60. West southwest wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning light filters over Downtown San Francisco, a soft veil of fog lingers over the city, particularly swirling around the Golden Gate Bridge, hinting at the marine layer that clings to the coastline. The sky, though predominantly clear, is draped in a gentle gray, offering a stark contrast to the bustling cityscape below. Today promises a modest warmth with temperatures nudging near 67, yet the sensation may lean towards a cooler embrace as the day progresses. There’s a playful dance of breezes—enough to stir the leaves but not so gusty as to disturb one’s thoughts.

For those stepping out into the day, a light sweater or a comfortable jacket will serve well against the coolness of the wind, especially as evening draws near, when a hint of drizzle may return to the scene. It’s an opportune moment for simple pleasures—perhaps a leisurely walk along the waterfront or a quiet coffee at a local café, where one can absorb the gentle hum of the city as it awakens fully. With these conditions, today feels inviting yet introspective, a canvas for both reflective solitude and unhurried exploration.
